Raghav Sethi

I'm currently a grad student in Computer Science at Princeton.

I'm advised by Dr. Michael Freedman, and part of the Princeton S* Network Systems group. I'm passionate about building software products that can improve lives and change the way people do business. My distributed systems research allows me to make such software smarter, faster, cheaper and more accessible.

Previously, I interned at Facebook and Microsoft, and completed my bachelor's degree at IIIT-Delhi. My resume has more details.

I am particularly interested in building and deploying large-scale networked software systems that underly many of the high-performance applications we use today.

Send me an email, or follow me on Twitter.
